rules_text:
When UUR04 Olgal Song-Seer enters create a 1/1 blue and red Siren creature token with “{T}:Target creature can't block alone until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery”.
Whenever a Siren you control deals combat damage to a player, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
